description.example: A bright streak flares from your pointing finger...

reason.example: must be a number conforming to the specified constraints

description.example: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range.

srd.description: Whether the spell is from SRD

description.example: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range.

spellSlotsByLevel.description: Spell slots by level with total and used counts

spells.description: Array of populated spell objects with full details (in API responses). Note: stored as ObjectIds in database.

example.name: Fireball
example.description: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range.

currentHitPoints.description: Current hit points, defaults to maxHitPoints

description.example: The mage is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared: Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation. 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield. 2nd level (3 slots): misty step, suggestion. 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, fly. 4th level (3 slots): greater invisibility, ice storm. 5th level (1 slot): cone of cold.

spellSlotsByLevel.description: Spell slots by level (will be converted to Map internally)

spells.description: Array of spell IDs or references

type.description: str, dex, con, int, wis, cha
at will, per day, recharge, etc.

description.example: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.

example.name: Dagger
example.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

standard.description: Standard actions available to the creature

example.name: Fey Ancestry
example.description: The creature has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

example.name: Innate Spellcasting
example.description: The creature's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: dancing lights, 1/day each: darkness, faerie fire.
